data.actual_result: The message doesn't appear and you leave the channel settings ( it doesn't apply the settings that you changed )
data.expected_result: The "Careful - you have unsaved changes!" should still show even if you try to leave using ESC
data.short_description: Bypass of "Careful - you have unsaved changes!" ( DOES NOT ACTUALLY CHANGE ANY SETTINGS )
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the setting of a text channel - change something - allow "Careful - you have unsaved changes!" message to come up - press on the x ( shouldn't work as intended ) - press esc instead
